Articles.Content: Do you think that there should be reactive missions? I.E.G: Find Jeb’s lost sandwich on minmus, and you actually have to do an EVA and pick up an actual sandwich. Or rescue lost kerbals?

1 minute ago, Billy Kerman said:

Do you think that there should be reactive missions? I.E.G: Find Jeb’s lost sandwich on minmus, and you actually have to do an EVA and pick up an actual sandwich. Or rescue lost kerbals?

Dear devs, please consider this and other people’s ideas about this topic.

This is an interesting idea- part contract, part side quest, part mini game…

I have this vision in my head of getting an alert that Jeb has lost a sandwich on minmus, and launching a little drone/satellite to find the sandwich and return it to Kerbin. That would be perfect in a dumb way. It reminds me of that animated short where they get a birthday cake on eve.

 

Not to get political, but THIS is how you include silliness in the game (looking at you rocket wobble).
The rescue a Kerbal missions were some of my favorite, (possibly only favorite?) missions from the first game.
As long as it's completely optional gameplay I have no problem with it but I was hoping we'd move past the "career mode" of KSP1 in KSP2.
